user_resource.name: authremoteuser
user_resource.description: Default service for retrieving one or more user profiles from the database

user_resource.name: login
user_resource.description: Functions to log user into system

user_resource.name: logoff
user_resource.description: Logs user out of system

user_resource.name: userprofile
user_resource.description: Retrieves a user profile from the database

user_resource.name: checkapp
user_resource.description: Verifies that user is logged into a specific application

user_resource.name: getresource
user_resource.description: Retrieves one or more services

user_resource.name: getuserresource
user_resource.description: Retrieves all services granted to a specific user

user_resource.name: getservices
user_resource.description: Retrieves all service profiles of a particular resouce type

user_resource.name: getRoles
user_resource.description: Retrieves user roles

user_resource.name: getResourceSubTypes
user_resource.description: Retrieves resource sub types

user_resource.name: getUserAppRoles
user_resource.description: Gets assigned and revoked application roles for a given user

user_resource.name: getSecuredUserResources
user_resource.description: Retrieves all secured resources assigned to a given user.

user_resource.name: getState
user_resource.description: Retrieves U.S. state data by state abbreviated code.

user_resource.name: getStateByCountry
user_resource.description: Retrieves state/province data by country code.

user_resource.name: getStateByCriteria
user_resource.description: Retrieves state/province data using custom criteria.

user_resource.name: getBusById
user_resource.description: Retrieve Business and address by business id

user_resource.name: getBusByName
user_resource.description: Retrieve business and address by business name

user_resource.name: getBusByBusType
user_resource.description: Retrieve business and address by business type

user_resource.name: getBusByServType
user_resource.description: Retrieve business and address by service type

user_resource.name: getBusByTaxId
user_resource.description: Retrieve business and address data using tax id.

user_resource.name: getPersonById
user_resource.description: Retrieve person and address data using person id.

user_resource.name: getPersonBySsn
user_resource.description: Retrieve person and address data using social security number

user_resource.name: getPersonByEmail
user_resource.description: Retrieve person and address data using email address.

user_resource.name: getBusAddrById
user_resource.description: Retrieves Business-Address contact data

user_resource.name: maintainBusiness
user_resource.description: Creates or modifies a business contact and its data

user_resource.name: getCode
user_resource.description: Retrieves general code data based on code id.

user_resource.name: getCodeGroup
user_resource.description: Retrieves a list of groups based on group code id.

user_resource.name: getCodeByGroup
user_resource.description: Retrieves a list of general code data based on group id.

user_resource.name: deleteBusiness
user_resource.description: Deletes a business contact and its address.

user_resource.name: getCodeByCriteria
user_resource.description: Gets general codes using custom selection criteria

user_resource.name: getBusiness
user_resource.description: Retrieves Business Contact data by long name, tax id, and/or main phone number

user_resource.name: getCustomer
user_resource.description: Retrieves a single busines contact record using customer id.

user_resource.name: getAllCustomers
user_resource.description: Retrieves all customer business contact data.

user_resource.name: createSalesOrder
user_resource.description: Creates a slaes order

user_resource.name: invoiceSalesOrder
user_resource.description: Invoices an existing sales order

user_resource.name: invoiceNewSalesOrder
user_resource.description: Creates and invoices a sales order in one transaction

user_resource.name: getClientProjects
user_resource.description: Project Tracker service for retrieving one or more projects pertaining to a client

user_resource.name: RQ_content_search
user_resource.description: Fetches images of documents from the MIME database.

user_resource.name: RQ_business_contact_search
user_resource.description: Fetches business contact data

user_resource.name: RQ_business_contact_update
user_resource.description: Updates a business contact record

user_resource.name: RQ_business_contact_delete
user_resource.description: Deletes a business contact record

user_resource.name: RQ_code_detail_search
user_resource.description: Fetches general code details

user_resource.name: RQ_customer_search
user_resource.description: Fetches customer data from the accounting application

user_resource.name: RQ_authentication_login
user_resource.description: Authenticates user login

user_resource.name: RQ_authentication_logout
user_resource.description: Logs user out of the system

user_resource.name: RQ_authentication_user_appcheck
user_resource.description: Checks if user is logged in to one or more applications

user_resource.name: RQ_authentication_resource_subtype
user_resource.description: Fetches one or more User Resource Subtype records

user_resource.name: RQ_authentication_user_resource_access
user_resource.description: Fetches the user's profile regarding granted and revoked resources

user_resource.name: RQ_authentication_resource
user_resource.description: Fetches one or more resource records from the user_resource table

user_resource.name: RQ_authentication_user_app_roles
user_resource.description: Fetches one or more roles pertaining to a given user

user_resource.name: RQ_authentication_user_profile
user_resource.description: Fetches one or more user login profiles based on selection criteria

user_resource.name: RQ_projecttracker_clinet_projects
user_resource.description: Fetches a list of projects related to a given client

user_resource.name: RQ_accounting_invoice_sales_order
user_resource.description: Invoices a single sales order

user_resource.name: RQ_us_states_search
user_resource.description: Fetches US State records based on state id, country id, state name, and/or abbreviated state code parameters

user_resource.name: RQ_postal_search
user_resource.description: Fetches geographical details pertaining to an IP address such as city, state, and country

user_resource.name: RQ_common_contact_search
user_resource.description: Fetches contacts from the business and person tables
